EmailTemplate.name: IT Case Ticket Questionnaire
EmailTemplate.subject: Re: {!Case.Subject} {!Case.Thread_Id}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Please provide the following details about the issue
1. What is the event of the job?
2. What is the name of the job?
3. If there is error, please provide the full details of the error?
It is important to reply to this email for immediate attention.
Thank you, sellingOnCall
{!Case.Thread_Id}
